title: Obtaining approval for the award of one civil work contract package in the Northern Province under the Asian Development Bank (ADB) funded Second Integrated Road Investment Programme
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Roads and Highways to award the contract package - 4 for the Rehabilitation, Improvement and Maintenance of the Marudankerni Road (B 371) in Point Pedro of the Jaffna District in the Northern Province under the Second Integrated Road Investment Programme funded by the Asian Development Bank, to M/s NEM Construction (Pvt) Ltd. for a sum of Rs.1,684.81 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
